Package fr.cyu.cybooks.dao.implement

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
fr.cyu.cybooks.dao.DAO<User>
fr.cyu.cybooks.dao.implement.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends DAO<User>
Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for managing User entities.

    • search

      public List<User> search(String searchTerm)
      Search for users in the database based on the search term. The search term is compared with the firstname, lastname and email fields.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The search term to use to find users.
      Returns:
      A list of users matching the search term.

      Returns:
